Café intenso, concentrado e curto. Base: Intense, concentrated, and short coffee. Base for many other drinks.
Mais suave que o espresso, semelhante ao: Smoother than espresso, similar to filtered coffee, but with a fuller flavor.
Cremoso e equilibrado, com uma espuma de: Creamy and balanced, with dense foam that highlights the coffee flavor.
Café suave e cremoso, ideal para quem go: Smooth and creamy coffee, ideal for those who like milk and coffee combined.
Espresso “manchado” com leite, mantendo: Espresso “stained” with milk, keeping the coffee intensity.
Combinação de café e chocolate, ideal pa: Combination of coffee and chocolate, ideal for those who enjoy sweet drinks.
Semelhante ao latte, mas com textura mai: Similar to a latte, but with silkier texture and stronger coffee presence.
Bebida clássica, equilibrada entre café: Classic drink, balanced between coffee and milk, popular in many cultures.
Café alcoólico tradicional da Irlanda, d: Traditional Irish alcoholic coffee, sweet and creamy.
Café servido com chantilly generoso, sub: Coffee served with generous whipped cream, replacing milk and sugar.
Espresso mais curto e concentrado, inten: Shorter and more concentrated espresso, intense and full-bodied.
Mais suave que o espresso, mas ainda man: Smoother than espresso, but still retains concentrated flavor.
Doce e intenso, popular em Cuba, geralme: Sweet and strong, popular in Cuba, usually served in small portions.
Pequeno e elegante, mistura café com cho: Small and elegant, mixes coffee with chocolate and milk, typical of Italy.
Café filtrado ou espresso servido gelado: Filtered coffee or espresso served cold with ice, refreshing and simple.
Espresso com leite gelado e gelo, suave: Espresso with cold milk and ice, smooth and creamy.
Café gelado com chocolate e leite, doce: Iced coffee with chocolate and milk, sweet and delicious.
Espresso com leite gelado e calda de car: Espresso with cold milk and caramel syrup, visually appealing and sweet tasting.
Café extraído a frio por horas, suave, m: Coffee extracted cold over hours, smooth, less acidic and highly refreshing.
Espresso com bastante água e gelo, refre: Espresso with plenty of water and ice, refreshing and light.
Café forte vietnamita com leite condensa: Strong Vietnamese coffee with cold condensed milk, sweet and distinctive.
Bebida gelada batida com gelo e leite, g: Cold drink blended with ice and milk, usually coffee or chocolate flavored, very creamy.
Versão gelada do affogato, café servido: Iced version of affogato, coffee served over ice cream, perfect as dessert.
Espresso com leite gelado e microespuma,: Espresso with cold milk and microfoam, delicate and refreshing.
